name: 50+ Notion Communities
description: 50+ Notion Communities This template contains a collection of 50+ Notion communities that you can join to engage with fellow Notion users as well as buy & sell Notion templates.What's Included?A collection of 50+ Communities dedicated to Notion in 5 different social media platforms, i.e.TwitterRedditDiscordLinkedInFacebookThe following information will also be included for each listed community.Number of members that are a part of that community.Whether self promotion is allowed in that comm
features: Number of members that are a part of that community.; Whether self promotion is allowed in that community.; Link to that community.; Get answers for the queries you have been struggling with regarding Notion.; Access to hundreds of different Notion templates created by users which you can get for free or at discounted prices.
